name: Sudoku Watch Edition
description:
Sudoku leaps into the next generation! Now you can experience the best Sudoku game made for the Apple Watch.

Face six difficulty levels ranging from very easy to insane. Players can select any difficulty level from the start.

Add notes to keep track of possible candidates of numbers.

View detailed game statistics just by one tap.

The best way to keep your brain active while killing some time. Play wherever you want, whenever you want on your Apple watch, iPhone and iPad.
